snippet: Eight soldiers from the American-led military coalition were killed in Afghanistan: five by a roadside bomb, two by an Afghan soldier who shot his trainers and one by small-arms fire.
abstract: Eight soldiers with American-led military coalition are killed in Afghanistan: five by roadside bomb, two by an Afghan soldier who shot his trainers and one by small-arms fire.
lead_paragraph: Eight soldiers from the American-led military coalition were killed in Afghanistan: five by a roadside bomb, two by an Afghan soldier who shot his trainers and one by small-arms fire.

headline.main: 8 Soldiers Die in Attacks in Afghanistan
